wikipedia_page.main: Gillian Clare McDonald (born 15 May 1964) is a British businesswoman. She has been the CEO of Costa Coffee since December 2019. She has previously been CEO of Halfords, CEO of McDonald's UK and head of Marks & Spencer's non-food business, overseeing clothing, home and beauty.

response: * Jill McDonald, CEO of Costa Coffee and former CEO of Halfords

In Dominic Paul was succeeded as CEO of the company by Jill McDonald. In March 2020, all UK coffee shops were closed indefinitely due to the COVID-19 pandemic. In late May some branches reopened for takeaway or drive-through orders.
* Hunter, Norman, with illustrations by George Adamson, Derek Cousins, W. Heath Robinson and Jill McDonald (1980), The Best of Branestawm London: Bodley Head
